methodology: Chunk-aware translation with LUT compliance. Chinese chunks map unambiguously to English targets.

S0001.target: I want to speak English with you now.

S0003.target: how to speak as often as possible.

S0004.target: how to say something in English

S0005.target: I'm going to practise speaking with someone else.

S0006.target: I'm trying to remember a word.

S0007.target: I want to try as hard as I can today.

S0008.known: 我要试着解释我的意思。
S0008.target: I'm going to try to explain what I mean.

S0009.target: I speak a little English now.

S0010.known: 我不确定能不能记住整个句子。
S0010.target: I'm not sure if I can remember the whole sentence.

S0011.known: 你说完之后我想要能够说话。
S0011.target: I'd like to be able to speak after you finish.

S0012.known: 我不想要猜明天会发生什么。
S0012.target: I wouldn't like to guess what's going to happen tomorrow.

S0014.target: Do you speak English all day?

S0015.known: 而且我想让你明天跟我说英语。
S0015.target: And I want you to speak English with me tomorrow.

S0016.known: 他想晚点跟大家一起回来。
S0016.target: He wants to come back with everyone else later on.

S0017.known: 她想弄清楚答案是什么。
S0017.target: She wants to find out what the answer is.

S0018.known: 我们想今天晚上六点见面。
S0018.target: We want to meet at six o'clock this evening.

S0019.target: But I don't want to stop talking.

S0020.known: 你想快点学会他的名字。
S0020.target: You want to learn his name quickly.

S0021.known: 你为什么在学她的名字？
S0021.target: Why are you learning her name?

S0022.known: 因为我想认识会说英语的人。
S0022.target: Because I want to meet people who speak English.

S0023.known: 我很快要开始多说话了。
S0023.target: I'm going to start talking more soon.

S0024.known: 我不会很容易就能记住。
S0024.target: I'm not going to be able to remember easily.

S0025.known: 在我必须走之前你会帮我吗？
S0025.target: Are you going to help me before I have to go?

S0026.known: 我喜欢感觉好像快准备好走了。
S0026.target: I like feeling as if I'm nearly ready to go.

S0027.known: 我不喜欢花太多时间回答。
S0027.target: I don't like taking too much time to answer.

S0028.target: It's useful to start talking as soon as you can.

S0029.known: 我期待尽快能说得更好。
S0029.target: I'm looking forward to speaking better as soon as I can.

S0030.target: I wanted to ask you something yesterday.

S0031.target: You wanted to speak with me tonight.

S0032.target: Did you want to show me something?

S0033.target: How long have you been learning English?

S0034.known: 当别人在的时候他不想安静。
S0034.target: He doesn't want to be quiet when other people are here.

S0035.known: 她今天下午不想读任何东西。
S0035.target: She doesn't want to read anything this afternoon.

S0036.target: We don't want to interrupt the story.

S0037.known: 我上个月开始仔细地考虑这件事。
S0037.target: I started to think about it carefully last month.

S0038.known: 我已经学了大约一个星期了。
S0038.target: I've been learning for about a week.

S0039.known: 但是我今天早上有点累。
S0039.target: But I'm a little tired this morning.

S0040.target: How do you feel at the moment?

S0041.known: 我感觉还好，但开始觉得累了。
S0041.target: I feel okay, but I'm starting to feel tired.

S0042.known: 我开始觉得比昨晚好了。
S0042.target: I was starting to feel better than last night.

S0043.target: I wasn't thinking about how to answer.

S0044.target: Or if I need to improve.

S0045.known: 我不需要知道所有事情。
S0045.target: I don't need to know everything.

S0046.target: But I don't worry about making mistakes.

S0047.known: 因为我认为犯错是件好事。
S0047.target: Because I think that it's a good thing to make mistakes.

S0048.target: I don't care about making mistakes.

S0049.known: 就是这样，如果你明白我的意思的话。
S0049.target: It's like this, if you know what I mean.

S0050.known: 我不是在试着尽快完成。
S0050.target: I'm not trying to finish as quickly as possible.

S0051.known: 我喜欢跟朋友们做有趣的事情。
S0051.target: I enjoy doing interesting things with my friends.

S0052.known: 他上周想给他朋友写封信。
S0052.target: He wanted to write a letter to his friend last week.

S0053.known: 她想把他的信放进她的包里。
S0053.target: She wanted to put his letter in her bag.

S0054.known: 我们想多给你一点时间。
S0054.target: We wanted to give you a little more time.

S0055.known: 没睡好的时候我不喜欢醒来。
S0055.target: I don't enjoy waking up when I didn't sleep very well.

S0056.known: 这样我就能记住怎么说几个词。
S0056.target: So I can remember how to say a few words.

S0057.known: 我记不住怎么说我想说的话。
S0057.target: I can't remember how to say what I wanted to say.

S0058.known: 当你能理解足够多的词的时候很有趣。
S0058.target: It's interesting when you understand enough words.

S0059.known: 我知道下周需要做什么。
S0059.target: I know how to do what I need to do next week.

S0060.known: 我还不知道怎么说足够多不同的词。
S0060.target: I don't know how to say enough different words yet.

S0061.known: 你能再慢一点说一遍吗？
S0061.target: Could you say that again a little more slowly?

S0062.known: 我不确定能不能同时帮你。
S0062.target: I'm not sure if I can help you at the same time.

S0063.known: 你确定你不介意帮我吗？
S0063.target: Are you sure you don't mind helping me?

S0064.known: 学英语不容易，但很有趣。
S0064.target: Learning English isn't easy but it is fun.

S0065.known: 花时间测试自己很重要。
S0065.target: It's important to take time to test yourself.

S0066.target: It's not difficult to find the answer.

S0067.target: Why do you want to stop?

S0069.known: 他不想整个下午都照顾那只小狗。
S0069.target: He didn't want to look after the young dog all afternoon.

S0070.known: 她不想告诉我它在哪里。
S0070.target: She didn't want to tell me where it was.

S0071.known: 我们不想让任何人听到真相。
S0071.target: We didn't want to let anyone hear the truth.

S0072.target: I think that you're doing very well.

S0073.known: 非常感谢，但是我还有更多要学。
S0073.target: Thank you very much, but I've got more to learn.

S0074.known: 非常感谢你帮助我理解。
S0074.target: Thank you very much for helping me to understand.

S0075.target: Have you got more to learn?

S0076.known: 我对已经学了这么多感到很高兴。
S0076.target: I'm very happy with how much I've learnt already.

S0077.known: 我对自己开始理解得这么快感到惊讶。
S0077.target: I'm surprised at how quickly I'm starting to understand.

S0078.target: I don't understand what you said.

S0079.target: When did you start to learn?

S0080.known: 我不确定什么时候会准备好。
S0080.target: I'm not sure when I'll be ready.

S0081.target: When do you want to start?

S0082.target: I'm not going to wait for you. Why not?

S0083.known: 我同意你对你朋友说的话。
S0083.target: I agree with what you said about your friend.

S0084.known: 我不同意他对我朋友说的话。
S0084.target: I don't agree with what he said about my friend.

S0087.target: They are people I don't know.

S0088.known: 我还没准备好跟我不认识的人说话。
S0088.target: I'm not ready to talk to people I don't know yet.

S0089.known: 我认为我在短时间内做了很多。
S0089.target: I think that I've done a lot in a short time.

S0090.known: 如果你能说得慢一点那就太好了。
S0090.target: If you can speak more slowly that would be great.

S0091.known: 很难想得足够快来及时回答。
S0091.target: It's difficult to think quickly enough to answer in time.

S0092.known: 我想要继续做这个一段时间。
S0092.target: I'd like to keep on doing this for a while.

S0094.target: This is the only way it will work.

S0095.known: 你准备好坐下一班车回家吗？
S0095.target: Are you ready to go home on the next bus?

S0096.known: 不，我还没准备好，我需要再多一点时间。
S0096.target: No I'm not ready yet, I need a little more time.

S0097.known: 是的，我准备好了，随时都可以走。
S0097.target: Yes I'm ready to go as soon as you want.

S0098.target: I should consider playing something else.

S0099.known: 你应该问问自己为什么不行。
S0099.target: You should ask yourself why it's not working.

S0100.known: 你不应该担心做类似的事情。
S0100.target: You shouldn't worry about doing something similar.

S0101.known: 我正在享受了解这门语言的更多信息。
S0101.target: I'm enjoying finding out more about this language.

S0102.known: 我们在试着说那不是那样的。
S0102.target: We're trying to say that it's not like that.

S0103.known: 我们不是在试着听更多的词。
S0103.target: We're not trying to hear many more words.

S0104.known: 我们需要改变我们正在做的事情。
S0104.target: We need to change what we're doing.

S0105.known: 那就是他不知道答案的原因。
S0105.target: That is why he didn't know the answer.

S0106.known: 我们不需要感到高兴，我们只需要努力工作。
S0106.target: We don't need to feel happy, we just need to work hard.

S0107.known: 我们希望看到你在做什么。
S0107.target: We hoped to see what you were doing.

S0108.target: We didn't hope to wake in the middle of the night.

S0109.known: 我们必须努力学习很多新词。
S0109.target: We must work hard to learn a lot of new words.

S0110.known: 我们是朋友，结束后我想要休息一下。
S0110.target: We're friends, and after we finish I'd like to relax.

S0111.known: 当我们学到新东西的时候它会改变我们的大脑。
S0111.target: When we learn something new it changes our brain.

S0112.target: That was very interesting, and I wasn't expecting it.

S0113.known: 我为什么记不住你说的话？
S0113.target: Why can't I remember what you said?

S0114.known: 我感觉今天做得比昨天差。
S0114.target: I feel as if I'm doing worse today than yesterday.

S0115.known: 我不觉得自己准备好进行对话了。
S0115.target: I don't feel as if I'm ready to have a conversation.

S0116.known: 这不是我能做出的最好选择。
S0116.target: This isn't the best choice I could make.

S0117.known: 我肯定比上次我们说话时做得更好。
S0117.target: I'm definitely doing better than I was last time we talked to each other.

S0118.known: 我感觉比我们在酒吧的时候好。
S0118.target: I feel better than I felt when we were in the pub.

S0119.known: 你离开之前我能问你点事情吗？
S0119.target: Can I ask you something before you leave?

S0120.known: 有趣的是你喜欢坐公共汽车。
S0120.target: It's interesting that you like to go by bus.

S0121.known: 不寻常的是你不喜欢用你的车。
S0121.target: It's unusual that you don't like to use your car.

S0122.known: 开始感觉更容易了，我对进展很兴奋。
S0122.target: It's starting to feel easier and I'm excited about how it's going.

S0123.target: I think that's a good idea.

S0124.target: I thought that was a good idea.

S0125.target: I believe that your idea was very good.

S0126.known: 这项工作正在改变我大脑的形状。
S0126.target: This work is changing the shape of my brain.

S0127.known: 那不是我想见你的原因。
S0127.target: That isn't why I wanted to see you.

S0128.known: 你像我以前认识的一个人。
S0128.target: You're like someone I used to know.

S0129.known: 你做得这么好我很高兴。
S0129.target: I'm so happy that you're doing so well.

S0130.known: 那很意外，因为他是我的朋友。
S0130.target: That was a surprise, because he's my friend.

S0131.known: 我脑子里有太多想法了。
S0131.target: There are too many ideas going around in my head.

S0132.known: 那没有她说的那么令人兴奋。
S0132.target: That's less exciting than what she was saying.

S0133.known: 当你们一起工作时你会很了解一个人。
S0133.target: You get to know someone very well when you work together.

S0134.known: 当你和他们一起处理困难的事情时这不是问题。
S0134.target: It's not a problem when you work at something difficult with them.

S0135.known: 我不知道你为什么认为这很好。
S0135.target: I don't know why you think that it's so good.

S0136.known: 当然你可以问她，因为她是我的朋友。
S0136.target: Of course you can ask her because she's my friend.

S0137.known: 经常说话比完美更重要。
S0137.target: It's more important to talk often than to be perfect.

S0138.known: 这是我朋友想和我们见面的地方。
S0138.target: This was where my friend wanted to meet us.

S0139.known: 对不起我需要这么早离开。
S0139.target: I'm sorry that I need to leave so early.

S0140.known: 对不起我看不到你在试着给我看什么。
S0140.target: I'm sorry that I can't see what you're trying to show me.

S0142.known: 你太好了，我很感激你的帮助。
S0142.target: That's very kind of you and I'm grateful to you for helping.

S0143.known: 这和我们之前讨论的是同一件事。
S0143.target: It's the same thing as we were talking about earlier.

S0144.known: 今天早上我醒得比我想要的早。
S0144.target: I woke earlier than I wanted to this morning.

S0145.target: Why are you not happy any more?

S0146.known: 自从我们试图修复它以来似乎什么都不管用。
S0146.target: Nothing seems to be working since we tried to fix it.

S0147.known: 当她看到我紧张时她很善良。
S0147.target: She was very kind when she saw me feeling nervous.

S0148.known: 当我不能回答时他不太有耐心。
S0148.target: He wasn't very patient when I couldn't answer.

S0149.known: 这不是很难，所以我希望你很快就能完成。
S0149.target: This isn't very difficult, so I hope you'll finish soon.

S0150.known: 你能告诉我你叫什么名字吗？
S0150.target: Can you tell me what your name is?

S0151.known: 那不是我希望会发生的事情。
S0151.target: That wasn't what I was hoping would happen.

S0152.known: 如果我知道你想要什么我会做得不同。
S0152.target: I would have done it differently if I had known what you wanted.

S0153.known: 我不会用完全相同的方式说。
S0153.target: I wouldn't have said it in exactly the same way.

S0154.known: 你周六晚上想在哪里见面？
S0154.target: Where do you want to meet on Saturday night?

S0155.known: 我不介意明天早上等几分钟。
S0155.target: I don't mind waiting for a few minutes tomorrow morning.

S0156.target: Do you want to go to a restaurant tonight?

S0157.target: I won't be able to be there next month.

S0159.target: That isn't what I'm trying to say.

S0160.target: How do you say this word in English?

S0161.known: 你周日早上能把那本书给我吗？
S0161.target: Can you give me that book on Sunday morning?

S0162.target: What do you think about that?

S0165.known: 但是我不确定是不是真的。
S0165.target: But I'm not sure if it's true.

S0166.known: 我的名字不是很不寻常。
S0166.target: My name is not very unusual.

S0167.known: 你明天下午需要做什么？
S0167.target: What do you need to do tomorrow afternoon?

S0168.known: 然后晚点我就能来帮忙了。
S0168.target: And then I'll be able to come and help later on.

S0169.target: What do you want me to do?

S0170.known: 我想要你告诉我你需要什么。
S0170.target: I'd like you to tell me what you need.

S0171.target: Do you want me to help you look for it?

S0172.target: Yes that would be very helpful.

S0173.target: No thank you I can manage on my own.

S0174.known: 你能理解我在说什么吗？
S0174.target: Can you understand what I'm saying?

S0175.target: What do you want to do on Sunday morning?

S0176.known: 我会问他明年能不能帮忙。
S0176.target: I'll ask him if he'll be able to help next year.

S0177.target: I'll ask her where she wants to go.

S0178.known: 我没时间，虽然我想见你。
S0178.target: I didn't have time, although I wanted to see you.

S0179.target: What are you going to do on Sunday afternoon?

S0180.target: I'd like to read my book for a while.

S0181.known: 但是我必须带我妈妈去看医生。
S0181.target: But I have to take my mother to the doctor.

S0182.known: 你在哪里看到我的钥匙了？
S0182.target: Have you seen my keys anywhere?

S0183.target: No I'm afraid I haven't seen them.

S0184.known: 是的，我刚才在办公室看到了。
S0184.target: Yes I saw them in the office a while ago.

S0185.known: 我觉得你把它们落在办公室了。
S0185.target: I think you left them at work.

S0186.known: 下周你想聊点不同的吗？
S0186.target: Do you want to talk about something different next week?

S0188.target: So I don't need to change.

S0190.known: 你介意我问你几个问题吗？
S0190.target: Do you mind if I ask you some questions?

S0191.target: No I don't mind at all.

S0193.known: 对不起但是我今天太忙了。
S0193.target: I'm sorry but I'm too busy today.

S0195.known: 我在试着找我放在桌子上的钱。
S0195.target: I'm trying to find the money I left on the table.

S0196.known: 你听说最新的想法了吗？
S0196.target: Have you heard the latest idea?

S0197.target: My son works as a teacher.

S0198.target: My daughter works for the council.

S0199.known: 我朋友以前在办公室工作。
S0199.target: My friend used to work in an office.

S0200.known: 他们说他们想确保我们按时完成一切。
S0200.target: They say they want to make sure that we finish everything in time.

S0201.known: 我们想知道会发生什么。
S0201.target: We wanted to know what was going to happen.

S0202.known: 没人知道怎么回答这个问题。
S0202.target: Nobody was sure how to answer the question.

S0203.known: 如果我请你帮我你会怎么做？
S0203.target: What would you do if I asked you to help me?

S0204.known: 我想让她帮你处理安排。
S0204.target: I wanted her to help you to deal with the arrangements.

S0205.target: I've forgotten the word I was trying to say.

S0206.known: 我喜欢有机会和你练习说话。
S0206.target: I enjoy the chance to practise speaking with you.

S0207.known: 你做完了你需要做的事。
S0207.target: You've done what you needed to do.

S0208.target: I didn't want to ask you how to say it.

S0209.known: 他们想花更多时间作为团队见面。
S0209.target: They want to spend more time meeting as a group.

S0210.known: 他们认为我们需要讨论这个问题。
S0210.target: They think that we need to discuss the problem.

S0211.known: 他们告诉我们他们不想解释。
S0211.target: They told us that they didn't want to explain.

S0212.target: They wanted to ask for help.

S0213.known: 我们不知道他们在试着达成什么。
S0213.target: We don't know what they're trying to achieve.

S0214.target: Did you have a good time at the weekend?

S0215.target: I went out on Saturday night.

S0217.target: I had a glass or two of water.

S0218.target: I didn't do much on Sunday.

S0219.target: It was nice to relax for a while.

S0220.target: Did you watch a bit of television?

S0221.known: 我看了足球比赛然后看了一部电影。
S0221.target: I watched the football and then I watched a film.

S0222.known: 他在试着告诉我他想要什么。
S0222.target: He's trying to tell me what he wants

S0223.target: He's going to ask you tomorrow.

S0225.known: 如果他能的话他会给你一个答案。
S0225.target: He would give you an answer if he could.

S0226.target: The man is trying to help me.

S0227.known: 那个人要告诉我一些新东西。
S0227.target: That man is going to tell me something new.

S0228.known: 那个人刚开始练习说话。
S0228.target: That man has just started to practise speaking.

S0229.known: 如果她能的话那个女人会帮你。
S0229.target: That woman would help you if she could.

S0230.known: 我认识一个想和你工作的年轻人。
S0230.target: I know a young man who wants to work with you.

S0231.known: 我认识一个想请求帮助的老人。
S0231.target: I know an old man who wanted to ask for help.

S0232.known: 我认识一个能记住答案的老太太。
S0232.target: I know an old woman who can remember the answer.

S0233.known: 我认识一个认识你姐姐的年轻女人。
S0233.target: I know a young woman who knows your sister.

S0234.known: 我昨晚遇到一个和你哥哥一起工作的人。
S0234.target: I met someone last night who works with your brother.

S0235.known: 我遇到一个人说他想告诉你一些事情。
S0235.target: I met someone who said that he wanted to tell you something.

S0236.known: 我认识一个人说她要试着帮忙。
S0236.target: I know someone who said that she was going to try to help.

S0237.known: 他想让我在周末之前告诉你。
S0237.target: He wanted me to tell you before the weekend.

S0238.target: He wanted you to tell me yesterday.

S0240.known: 我爸爸不喜欢停止说话。
S0240.target: My father doesn't like to stop talking.

S0241.target: I don't want to give it to him.

S0242.target: I want to give her more time.

S0243.target: I'm going to ask for the same thing to eat.

S0245.known: 我很高兴能在短时间内做了这么多。

S0494.known: 节目第一部分之后会发生什么？
S0494.target: What happens after the first part of the show?

S0496.known: 当真正重要的时候我不打算输。
S0496.target: I'm not planning to lose when it really matters.

S0497.target: That sounds as though you need to get some sleep.

S0498.known: 他独自站在入口里面那边。
S0498.target: He's standing alone over there inside the entrance.

S0499.known: 也许我们应该开门关窗。
S0499.target: Maybe we should open the door and close the window.

S0500.known: 你为什么不想坐在两个女孩中间？
S0500.target: Why don't you want to sit between the two girls?

S0501.known: 要是我能相信你们一起玩不吵架就好了。
S0501.target: If only I could trust you to play together without arguing.

S0502.known: 她差点迷路因为她左转而不是右转。
S0502.target: She almost got lost because she turned left instead of right.

S0503.known: 我不喜欢惹麻烦但那个是我的。
S0503.target: I hate making trouble but that one's mine.

S0504.target: I'm going to run across the grass.

S0505.target: So that I don't get left behind.

S0506.known: 多年前我们搬家之前我以前住在这附近。
S0506.target: I used to live around here years ago before we moved.

S0508.known: 担心你怎么付款没有意义。
S0508.target: There's no point worrying about how you're going to pay.

S0509.known: 我听说你要付一张新床的钱。
S0509.target: I heard that you're going to pay for a new bed.

S0510.known: 她去找一个安全的地方停车。
S0510.target: She's gone to look for somewhere safe to park the car.

S0511.known: 这个消息花了几个小时才传达到办公室的每个人。
S0511.target: The news took several hours to reach everyone in the office.

S0512.known: 我去拿钥匙的时候你能把门开着吗？
S0512.target: Can you hold the door open while I fetch the keys?

S0513.known: 当我上下移动头的时候最疼。
S0513.target: It hurts most when I move my head up and down.

S0514.known: 我第一天就找到了完美的房子。
S0514.target: I found the perfect house on the first day.

S0515.target: On the first day of the new year.

S0516.target: They both came on their own.

S0517.target: But they left with each other.

S0518.known: 我无法想象自己有完全相同的问题。
S0518.target: I couldn't imagine myself having exactly the same problem.

S0519.known: 我还没见过他们的新宝宝。
S0519.target: I haven't seen their new baby yet.

S0520.known: 这可能发生在整个家庭。
S0520.target: It might have happened to the whole family.

S0521.known: 我担心你会忘记我们为什么需要留在这里。
S0521.target: I'm afraid that you'll forget why we needed to stay here.

S0522.known: 让我们同意说真话是愚蠢的。
S0522.target: Let's agree that it was stupid to tell the truth.

S0524.known: 我三四分钟后给你回电话。
S0524.target: I'll call you back in three or four minutes.

S0525.target: To check if you've been able to finish.

S0526.known: 我发现很难相信你猜不出来。
S0526.target: I'm finding it hard to believe that you can't guess.

S0527.known: 猜猜谁告诉我那个有趣的故事。
S0527.target: Guess who told me that funny story.

S0528.known: 我可能应该把那些东西放在另一个房间。
S0528.target: I'm probably supposed to keep those things in another room.

S0529.target: Can you all put your hands up?

S0531.known: 任何人都能赢得比赛这不是真的。
S0531.target: It isn't true that anyone can win the game.

S0533.known: 她不会听你说的每一个字。
S0533.target: She won't listen to every word you say.

S0534.known: 这种糟糕的天气我们别出去了。
S0534.target: Let's not go outside in this dreadful weather.

S0535.target: He made a promise that he wouldn't choose the wrong job.

S0536.known: 我以前认为疯狂是不好的。
S0536.target: I used to think that being crazy was bad.

S0538.known: 我不想显得好像我不在乎。
S0538.target: I don't want to seem as though I don't care.

S0540.known: 如果你想不开车离开我不介意。
S0540.target: I don't mind if you want to leave without the car.

S0541.known: 试着慢慢呼吸是个好主意。
S0541.target: It's a good idea to try and breathe slowly.

S0542.known: 每当你感到生气的时候。

S0544.known: 谁说会很难的人说得完全正确。
S0544.target: Whoever said it would be difficult was absolutely right.

S0545.known: 该你把干净衣服拿上楼了。
S0545.target: It's your turn to take the clean clothes upstairs.

S0546.target: The dog is dirty and wet.

S0547.target: Because he has been playing in the mud.

S0548.target: I am feeling sad at the moment.

S0549.target: Because I have got to be quiet.

S0552.known: 村子另一头的教堂很丑。
S0552.target: The church at the other end of the village is ugly.

S0553.known: 我觉得那个小教堂非常丑。
S0553.target: I think the small church is very ugly.

S0555.known: 而且我太累了不想去拿一条新的。
S0555.target: And I'm too tired to fetch a new one.

S0556.target: They play music late at night.

S0557.known: 我希望他们不要放这么大声的音乐。
S0557.target: I wish they wouldn't play such loud music.

S0559.known: 你找到穿过树林的小路了吗？
S0559.target: Have you found the path through the wood?

S0560.target: It goes down to the beach

S0561.target: I don't care if it's a fast car.

S0562.target: I just want to get there safely.

S0563.target: I wouldn't have been able to keep going any longer.

S0564.known: 没有你的帮助我做不到。
S0564.target: I wouldn't have been able to without your help.

S0565.target: I'd have thought about it more carefully.

S0566.known: 如果是我选择的话我会想得更多。
S0566.target: I'd have thought more if it had been my choice.

S0567.known: 在户外看孩子们玩耍很开心。
S0567.target: It's been lovely spending time outdoors watching the children play.

S0568.known: 我期待下次见面时看到进步。
S0568.target: I'm expecting to see an improvement next time we meet.

S0569.known: 你决定愿意付多少钱了吗？
S0569.target: Have you decided how much you are willing to pay?

S0570.known: 你愿意为你的票付多少钱？
S0570.target: How much are you willing to pay for your ticket?

S0571.known: 我不确信那是个好主意。
S0571.target: I'm not convinced that would be a very good idea.

S0572.known: 你忘了上次他们来拜访时发生了什么吗？
S0572.target: Have you forgotten what happened the last time they visited us?

S0573.known: 这种事情让假期变得非常特别。
S0573.target: It's the kind of thing that makes the holidays very special.

S0574.known: 假期对每个人来说都非常特别。
S0574.target: The holidays are very special for everyone.

S0576.known: 等待一直非常令人沮丧。
S0576.target: It has been very upsetting waiting.

S0577.known: 我们一直在等医院的消息。
S0577.target: We've been waiting for the news from the hospital.

S0580.known: 我们经常想带孩子们去一个暖和一点的地方。
S0580.target: We've often wanted to take the children somewhere a little warmer.

S0581.known: 他想要更多地了解那是什么样的。
S0581.target: He'd like to know a little more about what it's like.

S0582.known: 在这里长大是什么感觉？
S0582.target: What's it like to grow up here?

S0583.known: 世界这个地方是什么样的？
S0583.target: What's it like in this part of the world?

S0584.known: 每天早上醒来看到山是什么感觉？
S0584.target: What's it like to wake up every morning and see the mountains?

S0585.known: 我从卧室窗户可以看到山。
S0585.target: I can see the mountains out of my bedroom window.

S0587.known: 她以前坚持我们晚饭吃鸡蛋。
S0587.target: She used to insist that we had eggs for supper.

S0588.target: So I wanted to grow up and leave home.

S0589.known: 她告诉我她刚看到最后一班公交车。
S0589.target: She told me she'd just seen the last bus.

S0590.known: 我看到最后一班公交车离开车站。
S0590.target: I saw the last bus leaving the station.

S0591.target: She followed me down to the shops.

S0593.known: 不管我怎么争论我还是得分享。
S0593.target: However much I argued I still had to share.

S0594.known: 我必须和我姐姐分享玩具。
S0594.target: I had to share my toys with my sister.

S0595.target: I need to lie down in the garden.

S0596.known: 我需要闭上眼睛休息一会儿。
S0596.target: And I need to close my eyes for a while.

S0597.known: 我怀疑他听过一百个关于这件事的故事。
S0597.target: I suspect that he's heard a hundred stories about it.

S0598.known: 他听过一千个关于他们在做什么的故事。
S0598.target: He's heard a thousand stories about what they were doing.

S0599.known: 如果你告诉我的话我会很高兴开车。
S0599.target: I'd have been happy to drive if you'd told me.

S0600.known: 如果你告诉我你有多累我会开车的。
S0600.target: I'd have driven if you'd told me how tired you were.

S0601.known: 我们在讨论这一切是怎么开始的。
S0601.target: We were talking about how it all started.

S0602.target: How it started in the first place.

S0603.target: We didn't have anywhere to live at the time.

S0604.known: 她主动让我们住在她那里。
S0604.target: She offered to let us stay with her.

S0606.known: 如果我当时知道我现在知道的我会等的。
S0606.target: If I'd known then what I know now I'd have waited.

S0607.known: 如果我知道的话我会做得不一样。
S0607.target: If I'd known I'd have done things differently.

S0608.target: It would have been the sensible thing to do.

S0609.target: The sensible thing to do would have been to ask.

S0610.target: He needs to look for work.

S0611.known: 我会准备好去别的地方看看。
S0611.target: I would have been ready to look somewhere else.

S0613.known: 我们可能会在那里买房子。
S0613.target: We probably would have bought a house there.

S0614.known: 那是你家人住的地方附近。
S0614.target: It's near where your family live.

S0615.known: 我觉得你这么说很勇敢。
S0615.target: I thought you were very brave to say that.

S0616.known: 你敢说你这么认为很勇敢。
S0616.target: You were very brave to say you thought that.

S0617.target: You thought that it was a mistake.

S0618.known: 感觉不像过了很长时间。
S0618.target: It doesn't feel like a long time.

S0619.known: 我们很久没见过彼此了。
S0619.target: It's a long time since we saw each other.

S0620.known: 自从我们上次见面已经很久了。
S0620.target: It's a very long time since we last saw each other.

S0621.target: I wouldn't have dared to tell her that it was broken.

S0622.known: 我知道孩子们把它弄坏了。
S0622.target: I knew that the children had broken it.

S0623.target: Do you want a cup of coffee or tea?

S0624.target: Yes, that would be great, please.

S0625.target: Do you want something to drink?

S0626.target: No, I'm not thirsty, thank you.

S0629.known: 我喜欢加牛奶但不加糖。
S0629.target: I like it with milk but without sugar.

S0630.target: Can I have something to drink please?

S0633.target: A large glass of water would be fine.

S0636.target: I think that that is Jane's bag.

S0641.known: 我觉得是那把椅子上的红色那个。
S0641.target: I think that it's the red one on that chair.

S0650.target: Do you want to go madam?

S0654.known: 我不确定我能不能帮您，先生。
S0654.target: I'm not sure if I can help you, sir.

S0655.known: 我觉得您做得很好，女士。
S0655.target: I think that you're doing very well, madam.

S0665.target: Do you all want to go?

S0668.target: I hope you'll all be able to go
